meanings.definition: A person who is a fan of hemp products.
meanings.sent1: My friend is a true hempie and loves everything made from hemp.
meanings.sent2: The hempie at the store recommended the best hemp lotion for my skin.
meanings.sent3: The hempie joked that they would only eat hemp cookies for the rest of their life.
meanings.sent4: She was such a hempie that her wardrobe was filled with hemp clothing from head to toe.
meanings.sent5: The hempie's passion for hemp products was unmatched by anyone else I knew.

meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of hemp.
meanings.sent1: The hempie fabric felt rough but durable against my skin.
meanings.sent2: The hempie rope was strong enough to hold the heavy load.
meanings.sent3: The hempie bag was eco-friendly and stylish at the same time.
meanings.sent4: The hempie scent of the lotion reminded me of nature and relaxation.
meanings.sent5: The hempie material was perfect for making sustainable clothing.

meanings.definition: To engage in activities related to hemp.
meanings.sent1: We decided to hempie by planting hemp seeds in the backyard.
meanings.sent2: She loves to hempie by crafting hemp jewelry in her free time.
meanings.sent3: The group planned to hempie by attending a hemp farming workshop.
meanings.sent4: He would often hempie by researching the benefits of hemp oil.
meanings.sent5: The community came together to hempie by promoting hemp awareness in the town.
